### Checklist

Please confirm the following:

- [ ] I have added my information to `src/data/members.json`
- [ ] My entry is in alphabetical order by last name (or added to the end)
- [ ] I am adding **only ONE member** (myself) in this PR
- [ ] My website URL starts with `http://` or `https://`
- [ ] My website is accessible and working
- [ ] I have read and followed the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines

### Preview

```json
{
  "name": "Your Name",
  "url": "https://yourwebsite.com",
  "program": "MTE 2025",
  "year": "3A"
}
```
